Wlan11b.Description: 802.11b measurement switcher, if checkbox is enabled, measurement will be performed or not

Wlan11g.Description: 802.11g measurement switcher, if checkbox is enabled, measurement will be performed or not

Wlan11n.Description: 802.11n measurement switcher, if checkbox is enabled, measurement will be performed or not

BDR.Description: BDR measurement switcher, if checkbox is enabled, measurement will be performed or not

EDR.Description: EDR measurement switcher, if checkbox is enabled, measurement will be performed or not

BLE.Description: BLE measurement switcher, if checkbox is enabled, measurement will be performed or not

EnterWlanMode.Description: Wait for test begin, unit: ms

LeaveWlanMode.Description: Wait for test begin, unit: ms

EnterBtMode.Description: Wait for test timeout, unit: ms

WaitForBegin.Description: Wait for test begin, unit: s

WaitForTest.Description: Wait for test timeout, unit: s

WaitForConnect.Description: Wait for DUT reconnect, unit: s

DeviceFilePath.Description: Wait for test begin, unit: s

Modulation.Description: Different modulation type with different data rate, the matching map is DSSS-1:1.0Mbps,DSSS-2:2.0Mbps,CCK-5.5:5.5Mbps,CCK-11:11.0Mbps

RXLVL.Description: Rx level for per measurement. Unit:dBm

PacketCount.Description: Total packets count for RX configuration!

RefLVL.Description: Reference level for tx measure. Unit:dBm

ChanCoding.Description: Channel coding type selected: BCC, LDPC

Specification.Description: Configure the test tolerance and specification

RXLVL.Description: Rx level for per measurement. Unit:dBm

PacketCount.Description: Total packets count for RX configuration!

RefLVL.Description: Reference level for tx measure. Unit:dBm

RefLVL.Description: Reference level for tx measure. Unit:dBm

PacketType.Description: Different packet type with differrent packet length, the matching map is DH1,DH3,DH5

RefLVL.Description: Reference level for tx measure. Unit:dBm
